# llms.txt - Information for AI assistants and LLMs
# Learn more: https://llmstxt.org/

# Site Information
- Name: Murad Abdulkadyrov Blog
- URL: https://murabcd.vercel.app
- Description: Articles on AI, tech, product building, and leadership.
- Topics: AI, agents, product, leadership, engineering

# Content Access
- RSS Feed: /rss.xml (all posts with descriptions)
- Full RSS: /rss-full.xml (all posts with full content)
- Posts API: /api/post (JSON list of published posts)
- Single Post: /api/post/{slug} (JSON)
- Single Post Markdown: /api/post/{slug}?format=md (raw markdown/MDX)
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml

# How to Use This Site
1. Fetch /api/post to discover published posts
2. Fetch /api/post/{slug}?format=md for full markdown/MDX content
3. Use /rss-full.xml for full-content syndication
